p: Six week-old male C57BL/6 mice were used in this experiment and maintained at 22 ± 2 °C temperature, 55 ± 5% humidity, and 12-h light/dark cycle. The animals were given food and water ad libitum. The animals were maintained at the Animal House Facility, Vipragen Biosciences Private Limited, Mysore, and acclimatized for 1 week before the commencement of the experiment. All the protocols and procedures were approved by the Institutional Animal Ethical Committee (VIP-IAEC-206-2020), and CPCSEA guidelines were followed throughout the experiment.
